channel.title: Would love some EXTREME help, sort of a reward in return
channel.description: Ok, whoever may be reading this at the moment, may consider me as a complete ignorant fool, but I can understand fully and I would have no room to talk in calling you some name, that is if you are a true scripter, we'll let's get to the point, what I am looking for is an expeirenced scripter, to hopefully fulfill me with his/her knowledge on making legit scripts, such as Pay scripts. If him/her decides to walk me through each step, I am a very dedicated person and am looking forward to spending much time on making scripts, and single ones at that, the person who agree's to help will get my full respect, 5M RS cash, and every script made by me and my brother. Thank you. Anyone can message me at richard_bell2011@msn.com if needed...Thank you again and I would Highly appreciate the help.

item.title: Would love some EXTREME help, sort of a reward in return

item.description:

yeah i would go with what exps offers. Ive seen his stuff its pretty cool.
